title: Default
description: Basic program for fractals with polynomial functions

title: Julia Map
description: Variation of "Default" that shows a map of julia sets.

title: Branching
description: "Default" with an addend for average coloring methods for polynomial functions

title: Cczcpaczcp
description: "Default" with a built-in special formula by Mark R Eggleston, called Cczcpaczcp

title: Frame Orbit Trap
description: "Default" with an orbit trap with a transparent pattern

title: Min/Max Trap
description: Depictures the minimum and maximum distance to the orbit trap

title: Fold
description: Program with an aggregator function (fold), also suitable for non-polynomial fractals

title: Lake Fold
description: "Fold" without bailout for Nova- and Newton fractals

title: Newton
description: Newton method for root finding fractals

title: Nova
description: Nova fractal defined by z - R * (z^power + argument) / (z^power + argument)' + p

title: Secant
description: Secant method for root finding fractals

title: Pendulum (Multiple Magnets)
description: Magnetic Pendulum Simulation with multiple magnets

title: Complex Function
description: Complex function (Color Wheel method by default)
